title: Hour 2 - Brian Kelly (07-21-20)
itunes:title: Hour 2 - Brian Kelly (07-21-20)
description:
Brian Kelly says he is optimistic about the start of the college football season. Coach reminds Dan that he and his team have been in the bubble and will have to come out of the bubble to play the season. Coach Kelly says he tells his players to prioritize if they really want to play football, but he says he relies on peer accountability.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

Brian Kelly says he is optimistic about the start of the college football season. Coach reminds Dan that he and his team have been in the bubble and will have to come out of the bubble to play the season.
